{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Mq-pro-pink-t.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Micro Development Board |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://mangopi.org/mqpro |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = MangoPi |model = MPi-MQ1 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = PH |revision = (V1.3) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = MPi-MQ1PH |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;D1; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = RISC-V |cpu1_type_rev = XuanTie C906 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = microSD |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K512M16HA-125:A; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = USB Female (Type-C)
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.2 (BLE), Micro SD Card slot, Mini HDMI output, MIPI DSI, DVP Camera interface, GPIO |addchip = 6V 2A Low Quiescent Current Dual Sync Buck Regulator;MPS;MP2122;;2;,,, 100mA Low Dropout CMOS Voltage Regulator;Torex;XC6206;;2;,,, Ultra Low Capacitance TVS Array;SemTech;RClamp0524P;;3; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian (unofficial), Arch Linux
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2022 |estprice = 28 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Trolink TL8723DS |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723DS; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MQ-Pro" is silkscreened on the board top. :"MANGOPI", "MangoPi.CC", "Card Computer" and "20220415 V1.3" are silkscreened on the board bottom.
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] D1 @1.0GHz :Single-core ''XuanTie'' C906 RISC-V *Storage: TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Memory: 1GB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Realtek]] RTL8723DS :802.11bgn (1T1R), BT 4.2 BLE *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (Type-C) port *GPIO: 1x 40-pin connector *Power Source: 5V via USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== *[https://linux-sunxi.org/MangoPi_MQ-Pro ''MangoPi MQ-Pro'' on '''SunXi'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/mangopi-mq-pro-a-possible-20-substitute-to-the-raspberry-pi-zero-w/ ''MangoPi MQ Pro a possible $20 substitute to the Raspberry Pi Zero W'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/04/09/mangopi-mq-pro-a-20-risc-v-alternative-to-raspberry-pi-zero-w/ ''MangoPi MQ Pro – A $20 RISC-V alternative to Raspberry Pi Zero W'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:MangoPi MQ Pro (1GB) Top.jpeg|Board top File:MangoPi MQ Pro (1GB) Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==See also== *[[MangoPi MQ]] • [https://github.com/mangopi-sbc/MQ Spec.] *[[MangoPi MQ Quad]] • [https://habr.com/ru/post/686520/ Spec.] *[[MangoPi MCore H616]]
